Rapporteur pụrụ iche na ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'Africa (SRRWA) bụ ndị ọrụ otu African Commission on Human and People's' Rights (ACHPR) na-ahụ maka ịkwado na ịkwalite ikike ụmụ nwanyị na mba nke African Union.  Rapporteur na-eburukwa ọrụ dị iche iche gbasara Protocol on Rights of Women in Africa, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Protocol Maputo..
Ọ bụ ACHPR kere ọrụ ahụ site na mkpebi ACHPR/res.38 (XXV) 99 na 25th Ordinary Session nke ACHPR na Bujumbura, Burundi, n'etiti 26 Eprel na 5 Mee 1999.
